content:
Hi,

I am trying to find out the right place to map bill classification code of type of bill. Bill classification code is the second digit of type of bill field.

Below is the link to value set
https://www.verywellhealth.com/types-of-billing-codes-2317067

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks
Ravi
@Simone Heckmann @Brian Postlethwaite

Thanks @Ravindra Kondiparthi we probably need to discuss during the FM call to determine the best implementation path. The UB-04 CMS billing code/type has some unique properties and some of the FM participants are looking at this
